The Twilight Giants series is a group of three novels written by Troy Denning and Published by TSR, Inc. from 1994&ndash1995 and then reprinted in 2005 by Wizards of the Coast. The novels take place in a little known part of the North called Hartsvale.
The books are
# The Ogres Pact (September 1994)
# The Giant Among Us (February 1995)
# The Titan of Twilight (September 1995)
* Giantcraft
